name: Meandering Maze of Murk
description:
This is a short timed clown maze platformer game I'm using to teach myself game development. It works out to about an hour or two of game play. Try to see how fast you can collect gems in each area.

You can purchase tools using gems you've collected from previous runs. The tools are meant to help you cut down your times.

It's low polish and clunky by nature and necessity. I didn't want the polishing trap to interfere with learning game development fundamentals. Set your expectations accordingly, and enjoy it for what it is!

------------------------ Current Version: 0.1.6 ----------------------------

Download the zipped file below into a folder, unzip it and run the EXE file.
